name: Real Heroes: Firefighter 3D
description:
Face the heat on the frontline as you
assume the role of a rookie firefighter
destined to become a hero on the
Nintendo 3DSâ„¢. Operate the tools of
the trade. Aim jets of water, swing
axes and prise open doors. Adding to
the already intense drama is an
impressive cast of voice actors.
Become that rarest of commodities - a
real hero!
